name: pitest
description: Simple extension for the use of pitests mutation testing program

saveResult.value.description: Specifies the file path where the output will be saved.

mavenExecution.value.description: Specifies the maven directory, if is empty try to use MAVEN_HOME.

withHistory.value.description: To speed-up repeated analysis of the same codebase.

mutationThreshold.value.description: Mutation score threshold at which to fail build.

include.value.description: The scm mutation coverage goal analyses only classes that match the filters and the source file has a given status within the project source control system.

showWebResults.value.description: To speed-up repeated analysis of the same codebase.
